name: Burst Fire mod
desc: Converts a chosen ranged weapon from semi-automatic to three round burst.
name: Reduced Recoil rounds
desc: Lower power rounds for more accurate follow-up shots.
name: Armor Piercing rounds
desc: Hardened bullets that are more likely to penetrate armor by sacrifice expansion/fragmentation to do so.
name: Telescoping Stock mod
desc: On-demand conversion of a pistol to a carbine. Bonus does not apply to pistol-specific extra attacks.
name: Foregrip mod
desc: Grant additional stability and recoil control.
name: Telescoping bipod mod
desc: Adds a bipod that greatly increases accuracy when firing from a prone or kneeling position but slightly decreases accuracy when firing while standing.
name: Suppressor
desc: Adds a bipod that greatly increases accuracy when firing from a prone or kneeling position but slightly decreases accuracy when firing while standing.
name: Power Increase mod
desc: Allows additional power to be drawn.
name: Finesse mod
desc: Improve precision at the expense of power.
name: Rebalace mod
desc: Improves the balance of a melee weapon, allowing better accuracy.
name: Vibro mod
desc: Causes weapon to vibrate rapidly, negating 50% of an enemies armor.
name: Electro mod
desc: Gives weapon chance to incapacitate enemies on critical hits.
